Title: InfFront
Description:
InfFront is a .NET-based UI building tool. In the first place it designed to automate development of rich highly customizable enterprise application clients. It's developed in C# programming language.
Keywords: WPF, WPF Toolkit, WCF, ADO.NET, WinForms
HomeWiki:
Project Description

InfFront is a .NET-based UI building tool. In the first place it designed to automate development of rich highly customizable enterprise application clients. You'll no longer have to spend your time arranging and customizing grids, panels, edit boxes or buttons. Don't program "forms", "wizards" or mouse click "handlers", just define the information you want to present and InfFront will show it at any .NET-based UI platform you choose.
Keywords: WPF, WPF Toolkit, WCF, ADO.NET, WinForms, ASP, C# 3.5, Visual Studio 2008

Get Started

  • The project is still in the early development phase but it already can be used to power up a simple enterprise client application prototype. Please read a brief introduction and download a demo project.
  • Download the latest svn snapshot (The Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 Service Pack 1 is required).
